basics.name: Suman Jayapathi
basics.label: Team Lead - Engineering at Xero
basics.summary:
I am a Engineering Manager/Lead Engineer with 18 years experience, working with iOS, .NET, Kubernetes and AWS.

I am an active proponent of using automation to reduce toil for engineers, I've hired and coached multiple cross-disciplinary development teams and directed technical roadmaps for mobile and web products.

My personal project consists of automating my home whilst self-hosting on a homelab k8s cluster, which is managed with GitOps.

work.name: Xero
work.summary: Xero's online accounting software automates bookkeeping and other tasks, to connect small business owners with their numbers.
highlights: As part of a strategy enablement team, I designed and deployed future-state frameworks for product teams
Hired and coached all levels of engineers across mobile and web specialisations
Led a team to build a JobKeeper calculator in record time which helped 500,000 businesses meet Covid compliance legislation
